thread.title: People can't, can't, can't believe how much some are paying for Justin Bieber's concert tickets
thread.title_full: People can't, can't, can't believe how much some are paying for Justin Bieber's concert tickets

author: Sohini Mitter
title: People can't, can't, can't believe how much some are paying for Justin Bieber's concert tickets
text:
We told you that Justin Bieber is performing in India for the first time.
Understandably, there's a lot of excitement, especially in millennials who can't have enough of the 23-year-old pop sensation.
But now there's a problem as we discovered once the tickets went on sale.
SEE ALSO: Mumbai's designer cabs are so stunning that even Chris Martin sat in one
Firstly, there's a queue. Even if you wait, you are never sure that you're going to get a ticket. What if they are exhausted by 2,000 or even 3,900?
And you thought only ATMs in India have queues? At least those were to get money, not spend it #JustinBieberIndia pic.twitter.com/6plre83R7c
â€” Sarit Ray (@saritray2001) February 22, 2017
And secondly, the ticket prices are ridiculously high. Much like the Coldplay tickets.
The highest-priced one costs Rs. 76,790 ($1,149). And that is a lot.
DAFUQ! Who bought these?? #JustinBieberIndia #PurposeTourIndia pic.twitter.com/0AEDzpgPbh
â€” Vinaya Sawant (@iamvinaya) February 22, 2017
Okay, agreed that only the VIP and VVIP seats are commanding a premium. But that doesn't stop Indians from taking potshots at Bieber or his brand of music.
Oh, there's also that kidney joke... usually made when iPhones go on sale. But Bieber has earned it this time.
Rs. 76,000 for Justin Bieber tickets.
The show is in Navi Mumbai.
In that area, for that amount you could buy a bungalow on the stage!
â€” Sorabh Pant (@hankypanty) February 23, 2017
Everytime Bieber sings Sorry, the crowd should scream Once More. How else can we get value for money? #JustinBieberIndia
â€” Cult Nonsensism (@NithyaRajagopal) February 23, 2017
Hope the 76k Bieber tickets come with classes to improve your taste in music.
â€” ST (@baldisgold) February 21, 2017
The ridiculously expensive ticket to @justinbieber is quite literally the price you pay for having a shitty music taste. #JustinBieberIndia
â€” Vaibhav Kattar (@kattarvaibhav) February 22, 2017
Sorry Bieber, I hv already sold most of my organs for iphone 5,6,7 and then Coldplay. Can't sell anything fr ur concert #JustinBieberIndia
â€” ANKUR CHHEDA (@BeingAnkur5) February 22, 2017
RT if you agree to this, Let it reach more people! #JustinBieberIndia #justinbieber #Farmers #indian #concert #Indians #fanzoop pic.twitter.com/I8JCM4tucW
â€” Fanzoop (@Fanzoop) February 23, 2017
Justin Bieber concert tickets cost as much as 25,000 â‚¹. You can hear kids singing better in Mumbai local for free.
â€” Pakchikpak Raja Babu (@HaramiParindey) February 21, 2017
One kidney sold for #ColdplayInIndia Now 2nd kidney for #JustinBieberIndia ðŸ˜’
â€” Ð¯Î±Ð½Ê‹â„“ (@Dilli_Wala_BF) February 23, 2017
And despite all this chatter, tickets are selling like hot cakes as the organizers revealed.
Heads up, Beliebers!
GA Phase 1, Diamond, VVIP 1 & VVIP 2 are now SOLD OUT!
GA Phase 2 to go live soon. Watch out! #JustinBieberIndia
â€” White Fox (@WhiteFoxIndia) February 22, 2017
The concert, part of the Purpose World Tour 2017, takes place in Mumbai on May 10.
BONUS: Justin Bieber is not having any of your screaming
